message.entry: Expected pairs of angle and magnitude as input arguments.
Input must be a real-valued vector of {0}
Number of angles must be the same as, or one more than, the number of magnitude values.
Each property name must be a character vector and must have a corresponding value argument.
{0} must be a character vector or a cell-vector of character vectors.
Peaks vector must contain only integer values or inf.
AngleResolution must evenly divide into 90 degrees.
datasetIdx must have the same length as ang.
Dataset index {0} exceeds number of datasets {1}.
Antenna Metrics not valid for RF data.
Valid handles are figure, axes, uipanel or uicontainer.
Use CleanData to ensure magnitude values are finite.
View method is invalid for polarpattern, instead use either ‘AngleAtTop’ property or interactively rotate using cursor.
